body:
You want to know how the famous swing state will vote so you're interested in **Wisconsin Polls**?

There's a better source.

You need betting data from Betfair.

The global betting exchange uses **[The Wisdom of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)** to create much more accurate predictions than the Arizona polls.

- - -

## **Wisconsin Election Odds: Donald Trump vs Joe Biden**

<canvas id='g14' name="brgraph" data-file-name="WisconsinOdds.json" data-only-names="Republicans,Democrats" data-start="2018-01-01 00:00" width="400" height="150"></canvas>

As you can see, Wisconsin is looking like it's going to the blue team. 

As you can see in the voting history below, this is a seriously big movement away from voting Donald Trump into office in 2016.

- - -

## **Wisconsin Voting History**

The Presidential Voting in Wisconsin has been predominately Democratic with seven of the last eight. However, in 2016, the 10 Electoral Votes went to Donald Trump over Hilary Clinton.

**[270towin](https://www.270towin.com/states/Wisconsin)** do a great job of displaying Wisconsin polls and Wisconsin results.

![Wisconsin polls and election odds](/images/uploads/wisconsin-polls-and-us-election-results.png "Wisconsin polls and election odds")

The **[FiveThirtyEight Arizona polls](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/arizona/)** agree.

- - -

## **How Are These US Election Odds Created?**

It doesnâ€™t rely on biased opinions or inaccurate polls. It exclusively relies on **[The Wisdom Of Crowds](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wisdom_of_Crowds)** from people trading on **Betfair**. 

That's people all over the world betting against each other. Swapping opinion with weight of money. There's no better source. 

Across all the markets, up to **$1 billion USD** will be traded on the US Election. 

People who bet on these markets use:

* **[FiveThirtyEight](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/)** for the latest polls, approval ratings and models
* All news sources, from Fox News to Twitter to CNN
* **[270toWin](https://www.270towin.com/)**, **[The Economist](https://projects.economist.com/us-2020-forecast/president), [Real Clear Politics](https://www.realclearpolitics.com/epolls/latest_polls/elections/)** and every other resource you can think of

From Trump lovers, to Trump haters, to the undecided. It's all factored, filtered and given weight by real money.

You will not find a more accurate data source for 2020 US Presidential Election predictions.

- - -

## **More US Election Odds**

We're determined to give you the most accurate prediction data in the world. Simply by reflecting betting data.

Make sure you check out:

* **[Election Betting Odds 2020: Trump vs Biden](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/election-betting-odds)**
* **[Biden VP Odds](https://www.betrefinery.com/us-election-betting/biden-vp-odds)**

With many more exclusive pages to come.
